item.title: Trump Takes Davos
item.description: We look at the news coming out of the World Economic Forum in Switzerland.

item.title: Jack Smith to Testify Before Congress on Trump Investigations
item.description: The appearance provides Mr. Smith with what is likely to be his best opportunity to challenge President Trump’s assertion that he was persecuted for h...

item.title: New Poll Shows Trump’s Support Slipping, and Clintons Face Contempt Vote in Epstein Inquiry
item.description: Plus, how A.I. is judging your résumé.

item.title: Winter Storm Forecast: What to Expect as Snow and Ice Move Across the U.S. This Weekend
item.description: Half the U.S. population will likely see some effect from the sprawling storm that will move across the country this weekend, meteorologists said.

item.title: Donald Trump, Live From Davos
item.description: It’s striking how clearheadedly and defiantly Europeans are reacting to the president’s provocations.
